mapper.select: SELECT min(user_id) as min_user_id, max(user_id) as max_user_id FROM users WHERE user_regdate >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{startDate}) and user_regdate < UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{endDate})
SELECT count(*) as reg_user_num FROM users WHERE user_regdate >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{startDate}) AND user_regdate < UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{endDate})
